data.eml:eml: Taxonomic study of the genus Neocarpia Tsaur & Hsu, with descriptions of two new species from China (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Cixiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhi, Yan, Yang, Lin, Zhang, Pei, Chen, Xiang-Sheng (2017): Taxonomic study of the genus Neocarpia Tsaur & Hsu, with descriptions of two new species from China (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Cixiidae). ZooKeys 695: 19-35, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.695.12809, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.695.12809
